About Me

Your search and passion for Product Management knowledge has led you to this blog. My name is Richard Robitaille-Muffler and I hope these posts help you grow on your product journey.

You can view my work experience by navigating to my Online Resume.

If you like source code, feel free to take a look at my GitHub repository for this site. I give credit to the Cayman theme for sharing an open and clean template.
